author: kfogel
msg: Parse "X:Y"-style revision numbers and dates, so we can handle
ranges.  Part of work on issue #505 ("svn log").
`start_date' and `end_date', and document some other fields.
(main): Initialize revisions and dates in `opt_state' by using above
The rest of these changes are unrelated to issue #505.  They're mainly
initialization fixes discovered thanks to compiler warnings:
`targets' to null, then check it later before looping over them.
to null, then check it later before referring inside it.
`n_basename' to avoid a compiler warning, but continue to depend on
the existing code flow for correctness.
`local_change' to avoid a compiler warning, but continue to depend on
the existing code flow for correctness.
`working_file' to avoid a compiler warning, but continue to depend on
the existing code flow for correctness.
`entrytime' to 0.  This actually fixes a correctness issue, not just a
to null.  This actually fixes a correctness issue, not just a compiler
Change logic to guarantee that `parent_dir' gets set.
`final_parent' and `final_basename' to null to avoid a compiler
warning, but otherwise do nothing, because Ben is clearly still
working here.  I think it was the debugging printf that really gave
it away, if you must know. :-)

author: cmpilato

author: cmpilato
msg: (commit_uri_unsafe): New test for URI-unsafe paths.  Currently,
those paths that are also XML-unsafe are NOT being test.
